Package gw.api.exception

Class GWIllegalArgumentException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
java.lang.RuntimeException
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
gw.api.exception.GWIllegalArgumentException
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.guidewire.pl.system.exception.ConvertToSOAPException, HasErrorInfo, Serializable
public class GWIllegalArgumentException extends IllegalArgumentException implements HasErrorInfo, com.guidewire.pl.system.exception.ConvertToSOAPException
This class is a Guidewire replacement for java.lang.IllegalArgumentException. This class will store the name of the argument that is in error, the illegal value, and it may also store the possible acceptable values. Also, this class utilized ErrorInfo so that web services and the rest servlet can externalize that information.
See Also:
